title: Practice-Based Strategy Development for Improving STEM Learning Habits

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, customized content delivery for working professionals, and skill reinforcement via project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three effective learning strategies in STEM fields.
Learners analyze their learning habits, develop improvement plans, and implement them for at least four weeks.
Learners enhance productivity by 20% or more by applying methods to create learning environments using digital/social resources.
Learners select and execute optimal learning strategies based on situational contexts (e.g., before exams, during project periods).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
